sign out.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to write your name in a book when you leave a place such as a hotel, an office, or a club
sign out.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to write your name on a form or in a book to show that you have taken or borrowed something
sign out.translation[0].definitions[1].e: Bernstein signed out a company car.
sign out.translation[0].definitions[2].d: to write in a book that someone is allowed to leave somewhere such as a school, an office etc
sign out.translation[0].definitions[2].e: Parents must sign pupils out when collecting them for doctor’s or dentist’s appointments.
